message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. I think this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thanks for the offer Alice, I appreciate you considering my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my range. I'm willing to pay $14000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $14000. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm still looking to get a better price for it. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $14000. It's the highest I can go at this time.

Hi Bob, I understand that $16000 is still a bit out of your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $15500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal considering the product's value and rarity.
